full_summary:
**NPP – S4935352 - Temporary Help Services Request for Proposal**
===========================================================

**Title and Solicitation Information**
------------------------------------

* **Title (English/French)** : NPP – S4935352 - Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for Temporary Personnel Services (English) / Besoin en services d’aide temporaire dans cadre de l’arrangement en matière d’approvisionnement pour les services de personnels temporaires (Français)
* **Reference Identifier (English/French)** : cb-346-38948210 (English) / cb-346-38948210 (Français)
* **Notice Category** : Temporary Help Services Request for Proposal Against Supply Arrangement
* **Solicitation Number (English/Français)** : S4935352 (English) / S4935352 (Français)

**Tender Submission Information**
--------------------------------

* **Publication Date**: May 24, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 30, 2024 15:00:00
* **Recommended Tender Submission Method**: Electronic submission through the Canada.ca/Tenders website

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

* **Notice Type**: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements**: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Background and Objectives**
----------------------------

* The Department of National Defense invites qualified suppliers to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) to provide Temporary Help Services under the Supply Arrangement for Temporary Personnel Services.
* The RFP aims to select a supplier to provide temporary personnel services in support of the Department’s operational needs.

**Security Requirements**
----------------------

* Level of Security Required: Secret

**Technical Requirements**
-----------------------

* Suppliers must demonstrate their ability to provide temporary personnel services in the categories of Electrical and Electronics Engineer

**Eligibility Criteria**
------------------------

* The RFP is open to Agreement Holders under EN578-172870 who have qualified under the Technology: Electronic Computers, Software and Telecommunications stream

**Attachments and Documents**
-----------------------------

Please access the RFP documentation through the following links:
* English: [Temporary Help Services Request for Proposal](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38784/s4935352-rfp-(en_0.pdf)
* French: [Bes
